livre1.name: La Cov√©die humaine - Honor√© de Balzac
text: ¬´¬†These debris threw a ravishing poetic effect on the canvas,
and dreamy ideas on the spectator's soul.
A poet would have remained here deep in a long melancholy,
admiring chaos filled with harmony, this destruction that was not without grace.¬†¬ª

livre2.name: Les Mis√©rables - Victor Hugo
text: ¬´¬†Noble and mysterious triumphs which no eye beholds,
which are requited with no renown, which are saluted with no trumpet blast.
Life, misfortune, isolation, abandonment, poverty, are the fields of battle which have their heroes;
obscure heroes, who are, sometimes, grander than the heroes who win renown. ¬ª

livre3.name: Les M√©tamorphoses - Covide
text: ¬´¬†I would tell you that, in the entire universe, nothing lasts.
Everything crumbles, and beings only take on a fleeting form.¬†¬ª
